Welcome to the SBAI Lab

We are a dynamic research group at the Korean Bioinformation Center (KOBIC). Our research group mainly focuses on the systems approaches to aging and immunity with a multitude of omics analysis, encompassing genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics, and metagenomics (microbiome).

Previous Next

For more information about our research interest, please visit Research menu.

We are looking for passionate new Ph.D. students as well as Postdocs to join our group (more info) !

We are grateful for funding from the Korea National Genome Project (NGP) and the Korea BioData Station (K-BDS) from National Research Foundation of Korea.

Funding:

- The Korea BioData Station (K-BDS) grants from NRF of Korea
